mdRecord.dcterms:description: Detail (upper portion) of side door: fanlight and coupled Ionic columns

Designed as a summer residence, it is two and one half stories high and clad with white painted wood shingles. The house features a two story portico, reminiscent of Mount Vernon. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_L._Breese_House [work]
